rows.label: qst640408_msg0001
rows.name: Hey look, those weird chicks are back.

rows.label: qst640408_msg0002
rows.name: Welcome back, weird chicks!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0003
rows.name:
Were our dads okay, then?
The hot springs've gone back to
normal, so we were hoping...

rows.label: qst640408_msg0004
rows.name:
It is as you say, beautiful maiden.
Thanks to our valiant effort, all
manner of issues were resolved.

rows.label: qst640408_msg0005
rows.name:
Your fathers asked us to tell you
they would be back soon enough.

rows.label: qst640408_msg0006
rows.name: That's great!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0007
rows.name:
Quite lucky, really, that we made it
this far without Kasane's "gift"
rearing its ugly head.

rows.label: qst640408_msg0008
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst640408_msg0009
rows.name: Whatever do you mean?

rows.label: qst640408_msg0010
rows.name: Don't worry about it.

rows.label: qst640408_msg0011
rows.name:
Now then now then! Let's go soak!
Nothing like a hot spring party to cap
a hard day's work!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0012
rows.name:
Dearest maidens...
Would you care to join our entourage
in a luxurious soak in the springs?

rows.label: qst640408_msg0013
rows.name:
Huh. I shoulda known Rinne would
pull something like this... You must not
like us very much, must you?

rows.label: qst640408_msg0014
rows.name:
K-Zakuro, dearest friend of ours!
You've got us mistaken!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0015
rows.name:
In tea parties, in pleasant conversation,
really in all the best things in life, the
more the merrier! Is that not so?

rows.label: qst640408_msg0016
rows.name: I...guess...?

rows.label: qst640408_msg0017
rows.name: We're fine either way I suppose...

rows.label: qst640408_msg0018
rows.name:
You're going bathing in the Smùide
Hot Spring?

rows.label: qst640408_msg0019
rows.name: That's right!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0020
rows.name:
What luck we have had, indeed, for
we have won a lifetime of free entry
to the Superbia baths in a raffle!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0021
rows.name: Really it was Kasane who won it...

rows.label: qst640408_msg0022
rows.name:
Wow... I never knew you could win
something like that!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0023
rows.name: Hey, I wanna see! Can I see?

rows.label: qst640408_msg0024
rows.name:
Behold!
And as you behold, feel free to bow
in reverent worship!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0025
rows.name: ...This...isn't for the Smùide Hot Spring.

rows.label: qst640408_msg0026
rows.name: Oh, you're right!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0027
rows.name: We beg your pardon?!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0028
rows.name:
Look, says so right here, in the small
print. Free lifetime entry to the, uh,
"Nopon Pioneers' Spring".

rows.label: qst640408_msg0029
rows.name: To the WHERE?!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0030
rows.name:
Where was it again? I think you go out
the city gates, past the Old Industrial
District and the Old City of Teddim?

rows.label: qst640408_msg0031
rows.name: That sound about right to Ohlala.

rows.label: qst640408_msg0032
rows.name: Why so far...?

rows.label: qst640408_msg0033
rows.name:
Welp, looks like we got had!
Good job us, haha.

rows.label: qst640408_msg0034
rows.name: That deceiving fool of a Nopon...

rows.label: qst640408_msg0035
rows.name:
He purposefully led us astray by only
saying it's in Superbia!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0036
rows.name:
He tricked us... Deplorable...
Despicable... Depraved...

rows.label: qst640408_msg0037
rows.name:
There, there...
Let's at least go and see, hm, Rinne?

rows.label: qst640408_msg0038
rows.name:
You never know, it might be better than
you think!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0039
rows.name: *Sniffle*...

rows.label: qst640408_msg0040
rows.name:
Oh, come on, no need to get
down in the dumps. We gotta try
and make the most of a raw deal!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0041
rows.name: You speak the truth!

rows.label: qst640408_msg0042
rows.name:
We must gather our entourage
and venture forth, post-haste!
To the hot springs, everyone!
